targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.forward_12m_total') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.forward_12m_total') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.received') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.received') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.portfolio_yield_on_cost_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.portfolio_yield_on_cost_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL) AS "Current Yield %", CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.portfolio_yield_on_cost_pct') AS REAL) AS "Yield on Cost %" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.portfolio_current_yield_pct') AS REAL) AS "Current Yield %", CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.portfolio_yield_on_cost_pct') AS REAL) AS "Yield on Cost %" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.income.projected_monthly_income') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL) AS projected_monthly_dividend, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.current_yield_pct') AS REAL) AS current_yield_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.market_value') AS REAL) AS market_value FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.holdings') j ORDER BY projected_monthly_dividend DESC LIMIT 10;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.projected_monthly_dividend') AS REAL) AS projected_monthly_dividend, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.current_yield_pct') AS REAL) AS current_yield_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.weight_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.market_value') AS REAL) AS market_value FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.holdings') j ORDER BY projected_monthly_dividend DESC LIMIT 10;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, json_extract(j.value,'$.ex_date_est') AS ex_date_est, json_extract(j.value,'$.pay_date_est') AS pay_date_est, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.amount_est') AS REAL) AS amount_est FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.alt.expected_events') j ORDER BY pay_date_est LIMIT 10;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, json_extract(j.value,'$.ex_date_est') AS ex_date_est, json_extract(j.value,'$.pay_date_est') AS pay_date_est, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.amount_est') AS REAL) AS amount_est FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.dividends.projected_vs_received.alt.expected_events') j ORDER BY pay_date_est LIMIT 10;
